name: Last Color Left
description:
We are three brothers. Every single thing in game made by us. Except background music. Some weapons sounds made by SFXR Others made by toys sound. 

shotgun sound s from nerf.

This game, models and sounds made in 4 days for weekly game jam - week 147-Last one left.

NOTE: 

I build for mac os too.

But I do not have mac. Please comment if you have any problem or help me to fix it.
